news.title: The Shapeshifting Relationship Between Science and Religion - The Wire
news.description: Religion in different forms has largely co-existed with science, with both domains contributing equally to our worldview.
news.content: The realms of science and religion are opposite poles of the human experience, dealing with the material and the spiritual, respectively. Scholars have widely debated the relationship, in particular the apparent conflict, between the two. The idea that they a… [+9429 chars]

news.title: Hong Kong, Singapore to start long-delayed travel bubble next month - Reuters
news.description: A long delayed travel bubble between Hong Kong and Singapore will begin on May 26, the two cities said on Monday, as they moved to re-establish overseas travel links and lift the hurdle of quarantine for visiting foreigners.

news.title: Apple unveils $1B investment to build east coast hub in Research Triangle, creating at least 3,000 jobs - WTVD-TV
news.description: Big news for North Carolina, Apple unveiled plans to build a campus and engineering hub in the Research Triangle, committing more than $1 billion in investments and creating at least 3,000 new jobs for the area.

news.description: Apple plans to release iOS 14.5 later today, according to media outlets like The New York Times and the UK's Financial Times. The software update...

news.title: See amazing video of Mars helicopter Ingenuity's boundary-stretching 3rd flight - Space.com
news.description: Ingenuity does some exploring on this hop.

news.title: 'The Voice': Kelly Clarkson pounces after Nick Jonas 'really messed up' his pairings, again - Yahoo Entertainment
news.description: Kelly Clarkson landed a four-chair-turn during the final round of knockouts Monday after Nick Jonas "really messed up" his pairings (again).

news.title: European stocks head for negative open ahead of Fed meeting, earnings - CNBC
news.description: European stocks are expected to open lower Tuesday as global markets prepare for the first day of the U.S. Federal Reserve's two-day meeting, and more earnings.

news.title: General Electric reports smaller cash outflow, reaffirms 2021 outlook - Reuters
news.description: General Electric (GE.N) saw less cash outflow than estimated in the first quarter even as its lucrative jet engine business struggled with the pandemic-led collapse of air travel, driving down company revenue.

news.title: Sony reportedly plans PSVR successor for next holiday season - The Verge
news.description: Sony’s next-gen PlayStation VR headset is likely to come out in late 2022, according to Bloomberg.. The headset is said to use OLED panels from Samsung Display, despite a broader shift to LCD in the VR market.

news.title: Watch astronauts give the International Space Station a power boost - CNN
news.description: On Wednesday morning, NASA astronaut Shane Kimbrough and European Space Agency astronaut Thomas Pesquet will conduct a spacewalk to begin the installation of new solar arrays. The panels will help provide a power boost to the space station.

news.title: The Killers and Bruce Springsteen Share New Song “Dustland”: Listen - Pitchfork
news.description: A newly recorded rendition of the band’s 2008 song “A Dustland Fairytale”

news.title: Trump White House Pressed Justice Department on Election Claims in Emails - The Wall Street Journal

news.title: Vor US-Zinsentscheid: DAX wie festgemauert | tagesschau.de - tagesschau.de
news.description: Vor dem Zinsentscheid der US-Notenbank Federal Reserve am Abend herrscht an der Börse gespanntes Warten. Die Anleger lassen sich nicht aus der Reserve locken.

news.title: Droht der Erde ihr Schicksal?: Der neue Anlauf zur Venus - n-tv NACHRICHTEN
news.description: Die Venus könnte ein Zwilling der Erde sein - doch auf ihrer Oberfläche herrschen extreme Bedingungen. Ein Treibhauseffekt macht den Planeten zur lebensfeindlichen Hölle. Doch wie konnte es so weit kommen? Eine ganze Reihe neuer Weltraum-Missionen sollen das …
